meanings.definition: A type of bacteria that are spiral-shaped and can cause diseases such as syphilis and Lyme disease.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study spirochetes to understand diseases like syphilis.
meanings.sent3: The spirochetes in the microscope looked like little springs bouncing around.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bacteria, spirochetes are the elegant dancers.
meanings.sent5: The spiral form of spirochetes makes them unique among bacteria.
